00282         /************************ MOTOR PARAMETERS ****************************/
00283 
00284         // Select one from the following motor types:
00285         // DC Motor                                             (MT_DC_MOTOR)
00286         // Brushless w/Sinus Commutation        (MT_EC_SINUS_COMMUTATED_MOTOR)
00287         // Brushless w/Block Commutation        (MT_EC_BLOCK_COMMUTATED_MOTOR)
00288         int motorType;
00289 
00290         int motorNominalCurrent;
00291         int motorMaxCurrent;
00292         int motorThermalTimeConstant;
00293         int motorNumberPolePairs;
00294 
00295         /************************ SENSOR PARAMETERS ****************************/
00296 
00297         // Select one from the following sensor types:
00298         // None                                                         (ST_UNKNOWN)
00299         // Inc. Encoder 3 Channel                       (ST_INC_ENCODER_3CHANNEL)
00300         // Inc. Encoder 2 Channel                       (ST_INC_ENCODER_2CHANNEL)
00301         // Hall Effect                                          (ST_HALL_SENSORS)
00302         // SSI Abs. Encoder Binary                      (ST_SSI_ABS_ENCODER_BINARY)
00303         // SSI Abs. Encoder Gray                        (ST_SSI_ABS_ENCODER_GRAY)
00304         int sensorType;

00356         std::string getErrorInfo(unsigned long error){
00357                 std::string errorStr;
00358                 char* errorInfo = new char[400];
00359                 VCS_GetErrorInfo(error,errorInfo,400);
00360                 errorStr.append(errorInfo);
00361                 delete errorInfo;
00362                 return errorStr;
00363         }
00364 
00374         bool setSensorType(int sensorType){
00375                 int loopCounter=0;
00376                 while(!VCS_SetSensorType(keyHandle, nodeID, sensorType, &errorCode)){
00377                         if (loopCounter++ > maxCommandAttempts) {
00378                                 ROS_ERROR_STREAM("Could not set Node " << nodeID << " Sensor Type: " << getErrorInfo(errorCode));
00379                                 return false;
00380                         }
00381                 }
00382                 nh.setParam("Sensor_Type", sensorType);
00383                 return true;
00384         }
00385 
00386         bool setIncEncoderParameters(int sensorIncEncoderResolution, int sensorInversion){
00387                 int loopCounter=0;
00388                 while(!VCS_SetIncEncoderParameter(keyHandle, nodeID, sensorIncEncoderResolution,
00389                                 sensorInversion, &errorCode)){
00390                         if (loopCounter++ > maxCommandAttempts){
00391                                 ROS_ERROR_STREAM("Could not set Node " << nodeID << " Incremental Encoder Parameters: " << getErrorInfo(errorCode));
00392                                 return false;
00393                         }
00394                 }
00395                 nh.setParam("Encoder_Resolution",sensorIncEncoderResolution);
00396                 nh.setParam("Sensor_Inversion",sensorInversion);
00397                 return true;
00398         }

00412         bool setSsiAbsEncoderParameters(int sensorSSIEncoderDataRate, int sensorSSIEncoderNumberMultiTurnBits,
00413                         int sensorSSIEncoderNumberSingleTurnBits, int sensorInversion){
00414                 int loopCounter=0;
00415                 while(!VCS_SetSsiAbsEncoderParameter(keyHandle, nodeID, sensorSSIEncoderDataRate,
00416                                 sensorSSIEncoderNumberMultiTurnBits, sensorSSIEncoderNumberSingleTurnBits,
00417                                 sensorInversion, &errorCode)){
00418                         if (loopCounter++ > maxCommandAttempts){
00419                                 ROS_ERROR_STREAM("Could not set Node " << nodeID << " SSI Absolute Encoder Parameters: " << getErrorInfo(errorCode));
00420                                 return false;
00421                         }
00422                 }
00423                 nh.setParam("Encoder_Number_Multiturn_Bits",sensorSSIEncoderNumberMultiTurnBits);
00424                 nh.setParam("Encoder_Number_Single_Turn_Bits",sensorSSIEncoderNumberSingleTurnBits);
00425                 nh.setParam("Encoder_Data_Rate", sensorSSIEncoderDataRate);
00426                 nh.setParam("Sensor_Inversion", sensorInversion);
00427                 return true;
00428         }

00454         bool setDCMotorParameters(int motorNominalCurrent, int motorMaxCurrent, int motorThermalTimeConstant) {
00455                 int loopCounter = 0;
00456                 while (!VCS_SetDcMotorParameter(keyHandle, nodeID, motorNominalCurrent,
00457                                 motorMaxCurrent, motorThermalTimeConstant, &errorCode)) {
00458                         if (loopCounter++ > maxCommandAttempts) {
00459                                 ROS_ERROR_STREAM("Could not set Node " << nodeID << " DC Motor Parameters: " << getErrorInfo(errorCode));
00460                                 return false;
00461                         }
00462                 }
00463                 nh.setParam("Motor_Nominal_Current", motorNominalCurrent);
00464                 nh.setParam("Motor_Max_Current", motorMaxCurrent);
00465                 nh.setParam("Motor_Thermal_Time_Constant", motorThermalTimeConstant);
00466                 return true;
00467         }

00470                         int motorNumberPolePairs) {

00487         bool saveParameters() {
00488                 int loopCounter = 0;
00489                 while (!VCS_Store(keyHandle, nodeID, &errorCode)) {
00490                         if (loopCounter++ > maxCommandAttempts) {
00491                                 ROS_ERROR_STREAM("Could not Store Node " << nodeID << " Parameters: " << getErrorInfo(errorCode));
00492                                 return false;
00493                         }
00494                 }
00495                 return true;
00496         }
00497 
00498         bool setMaxVelocity(int maxVelocity) {
00499                 int loopCounter = 0;
00500                 while (!VCS_SetMaxProfileVelocity(keyHandle, nodeID, maxVelocity,
00501                                 &errorCode)) {
00502                         ROS_WARN("Command failed to set Maximum Velocity. Retrying...");
00503                         if (loopCounter++ > maxCommandAttempts) {
00504                                 ROS_ERROR_STREAM("Could not set Node " << nodeID << " Maximum Velocity: " << getErrorInfo(errorCode));
00505                                 return false;
00506                         }
00507                 }
00508                 nh.setParam("Max_Profile_Velocity", maxVelocity);
00509                 this->maxProfileVelocity = maxVelocity;
00510                 return true;
00511         }
00512

00562         bool moveWithVelocity(long int setpoint){
00563                 int loopCounter=0;
00564                 while(!VCS_MoveWithVelocity(keyHandle, nodeID, setpoint, &errorCode)){
00565                         ROS_WARN_STREAM("Node " << nodeID << " could not set velocity. Retrying..." );
00566                         if(loopCounter++>maxCommandAttempts){
00567                                 ROS_ERROR_STREAM("Could not set Node " << nodeID << " Velocity: " << getErrorInfo(errorCode));
00568                                 return false;
00569                         }
00570                 }
00571 
00572                 return true;
00573         }

00586         bool moveToPosition(long int setpoint, int absolute, int immediately){
00587                 int loopCounter=0;
00588                 while(!VCS_MoveToPosition(keyHandle, nodeID, setpoint,absolute, immediately, &errorCode)){
00589                         ROS_WARN_STREAM("Node " << nodeID << " could not set velocity. Retrying..." );
00590                         if(loopCounter++>maxCommandAttempts){
00591                                 ROS_ERROR_STREAM("Could not move to Position: " << getErrorInfo(errorCode));
00592                                 return false;
00593                         }
00594                 }
00595                 return true;
00596         }

00598         bool setVelocityPID(int pGain, int iGain){
00599                 int loopCounter=0;
00600                 while(!VCS_SetVelocityRegulatorGain(keyHandle, nodeID, pGain, iGain, &errorCode)){
00601                         if(loopCounter++>maxCommandAttempts){
00602                                 ROS_ERROR_STREAM("Could not set Velocity PID: " << getErrorInfo(errorCode));
00603                                 return false;
00604                         }
00605                 }
00606                 nh.setParam("Velocity_P",velocityP);
00607                 nh.setParam("Velocity_I",velocityI);
00608                 return true;
00609         }
00610 
00611         bool setPositionPID(int pGain, int iGain, int dGain){
00612                 int loopCounter=0;
00613                 while(!VCS_SetPositionRegulatorGain(keyHandle, nodeID, pGain, iGain, dGain, &errorCode)){
00614                         if(loopCounter++>maxCommandAttempts){
00615                                 ROS_ERROR_STREAM("Could not set Position PID: " << getErrorInfo(errorCode));
00616                                 return false;
00617                         }
00618                 }
00619                 nh.setParam("Position_P",positionP);
00620                 nh.setParam("Position_I",positionI);
00621                 nh.setParam("Position_D",positionD);
00622                 return true;
00623         }

00646         bool setQuickstop(int quickstopPin, bool activeLow, bool enable){
00647                 int loopCounter=0;
00648                 while(!VCS_DigitalInputConfiguration(keyHandle,nodeID, quickstopPin,DIC_QUICK_STOP,1,int(activeLow),int(enable),&errorCode)){
00649                         if(loopCounter++>maxCommandAttempts){
00650                                 ROS_ERROR_STREAM("Could not set Quickstop: " << getErrorInfo(errorCode));
00651                                 return false;
00652                         }
00653                 }
00654                 return true;
00655         }

00659                 while(!VCS_GetVelocityRegulatorGain(keyHandle, nodeID,(unsigned short*) &velocityP,(unsigned short*) &velocityI, &errorCode)){

00662                                 return false;

00830         bool loadParametersFromEpos(){
00831                 if(keyHandle==0){
00832                         ROS_ERROR_STREAM("Keyhandle Not Initialized. Cannot Retrieve Parameters from EPOS."<<
00833                                         "Please Initialize Keyhandle");
00834                         return false;
00835                 }
00836 
00837                 ROS_INFO_STREAM("Loading Parameters from EPOS "<<nodeID);
00838 
00839                 loadMotorTypeFromEpos();
00840                 loadDCMotorParametersFromEpos();
00841                 loadECMotorParametersFromEpos();
00842 
00843                 loadSensorTypeFromEpos();
00844                 loadSsiAbsEncoderParametersFromEpos();
00845                 loadHallSensorParametersFromEpos();
00846                 loadIncEncoderParametersFromEpos();
00847 
00848                 loadPositionPIDFromEpos();
00849                 loadVelocityPIDFromEpos();
00850                 loadCurrentPIDFromEpos();
00851 
00852                 loadMaxAccelerationFromEpos();
00853                 loadMaxFollowingErrorFromEpos();
00854                 loadMaxVelocityFromEpos();
00855 
00856                 loadPositionProfileFromEpos();
00857                 loadVelocityProfileFromEpos();
00858 
00859                 return true;
00860         }
00861 
00862 
00863 };
00864
